# car

Excessive wanderwort for 1. circle 2. car in their widest senses

𓂧 𓄿 𓇋 𓂋 𓌗 𓀜 կառավարել kaṙavarel (control) ⇔ κρατέω kratéō √car ⇔ Kraft

𓌝 = 𒄑𒇀 GIGIR car chariot 𒄑𒇥 gigir₂ 𒆸·𒌀 gigirₓ

𒄑𒈥𒁍𒁕 giš.MAR.GÍD.DA •cart

carriage
